references.paper_title: Multiple view geometry in computer vision
references.reason: As a seminal work in computer vision, this book provides the theoretical foundation for geometric reconstruction and camera pose estimation, which are central to AETHER's capabilities.

references.paper_title: Image quality assessment: from error visibility to structural similarity
references.reason: This paper introduces structural similarity index (SSIM), which is used as a primary metric to evaluate the image quality in AETHERs generation and prediction experiments.

references.paper_title: Distinctive image features from scale-invariant keypoints
references.reason: This paper introduces scale-invariant feature transform (SIFT), a feature descriptor widely used in image-based 3D reconstruction and is used by AETHER for feature extraction and robust correspondence estimation.

references.paper_title: Raft: Recurrent all-pairs field transforms for optical flow
references.reason: This paper introduces recurrent all-pairs field transforms (RAFT), an optical flow estimation algorithm and it is used for estimating the magnitude of motion and removing unsuitable frames to enhance camera parameter extraction.
